name: EGGsly Legacy One by Karrie Ross

metadata.name: EGGsly by Karrie Ross #1
metadata.description:
There is an EGGsly™ in each of us.

EGGsly is a gender-neutral collection of 1,000 pieces of 276 hand drawn traits, and randomly generated NFTs built  and exists on the Ethereum Blockchain. 

There is also an OG collection, created in 2021 on the polygon blockchain. Each OG NFT is hand-assembled, and some are animated in Photoshop, making them one-of-a-kind, and were dropped starting September 3, 2021. 

Created and illustrated by Karrie Ross. She shares her love of EGGs, and the actions of observation and play are exampled in each piece of art. NFTs #1-10 of the OG collection are the building parts of EGGsly, the remaining are emotions and adventures. 

©2022 Karrie Ross all rights reserved unless stated in the website's terms and conditions.

Website: http://eggsly.io

Twitter:  https://twitter.com/eggslyio

OG EGGsly collection: https://opensea.io/collection/eggsly-100

Karrie Ross: http://karrieross.com
